Scene:
The Torture of Chujohime in the Snow
(Chūjōhime yukizeme / 中将姫雪責)

Play: The Pines on Mount Hibari (ひばり山古跡松)

Production: February 1968

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Nanbudayū V (竹本南部大夫 (五))

Takemoto Aioidayū IV (see also Takemoto Aikodayū I) (竹本相生大夫 (四))



Shamisen Players:

Nozawa Matsunosuke (野澤松之輔)

Tsuruzawa Jūzō IV (鶴澤重造 (四))
